name: CryptMi
description: CryptMi is a loyalty rewards platform that allows you to connect all your digital assets to buy all the things you love anywhere in the world, without currency and merchant constraints. Jump into the first-ever experience that gives you more spending power by unlocking all your digital assets and combining them to pay for everyday essentials, NFTs and purchases in the metaverse, by making dynamic and instant swaps between rewards, crypto and local currencies. It's like having one single source of power for all what you own.
